title: MC_GroupReadActualAcceleration (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_GroupReadActualAcceleration
This function block returns the current acceleration of an axis group
in the selected coordinate system.
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Get the acceleration of the axis group
in the selected coordinate system while enabled

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
